comment.author: 10530558@N03
comment._content: Some of my ancestors came from Prussia in the mid 1800s, and were a family of tailors. I've heard from cousins that there is a photo of a large pair of shears, like this one, somewhere, taken in their shop near Dayton Ohio... I also have a thing for antique irons, though I rarely do any ironing myself. This is a lovely portrait.
